resources.string:
WELCOME TO DEALSCHASR!

REDEEM VOUCHERS AND SHOW INTERESTS IN
LOCAL DEALS LIVE ON YOUR MOBILE
JUST LOOK ON THE MAP FOR LIVE DEALS AND EVENTS NEAR YOU
BROWSE AND REDEEM AVAILABLE VOUCHERS OR LET THE VENUES KNOW YOUR WILL BE THERE FOR SPECIAL OFFERS AND EVENTS
GET TO THE VENUE BEFORE YOUR VOUCHER EXPIRES, SHOW THE VOUCHER AND ENJOY YOUR DEAL!
NOW YOU ARE READY TO CHASE SOME DEALS!
